dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: You look like a man who's looking for some mostly-fresh animal parts.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's talk about Celia.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: Oh. Haven't seen her in a few days, but I've been meaning to ask her how that raptidon acid is working out.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: I hope it's working okay, because no one else really seems interested in this stuff.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Would you consider going on a date with her?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: She likes you.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: Wait, I see what's going on. She put you up to this so she could get a discount, hm?

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: Don't get me wrong. I'd like to give her a discount. She's a real fine lady. Always talks nice and slow so I understand.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: But if I give her one, I won't hardly make a bit. On account of no one else having any use for raptidon tongues.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: She doesn't want a discount. She's attracted to you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Don't take my word for it. Spend some time with her - I promise she won't ask for a discount.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Consider this a <oeiglobal>Bribe_Amount</oeiglobal>-bit advance against lost business.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Forget this.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: Nuh-uh. Lot of people think I'm not too bright, but you're not fooling me.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: I know she can't get these goods anywhere else.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: You sound pretty sure. And she is awful nice...

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: Okay. I'll do it. Once her shift ends, we'll go someplace nice. Maybe to Chef Raymond's.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: I guess I could afford to take a risk...

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: Nice of you to say. I like her, too.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: She's interested in you. Romantically.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: No, I mean she really likes you.

dialog.speaker: sebastianadams (Male)
dialog.utterance: And I gotta admire anyone with her passion for canid hides. But you don't have to butter me up.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Since you've got so much in common, maybe you should let her take you out.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You idiot. I'm trying to tell you she wants to date you.
